task.prompt: The projection of $\begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ 3 \end{pmatrix}$ onto a certain vector $\mathbf{w}$ is $\begin{pmatrix} -9/10 \\ 3/10 \end{pmatrix}.$  Find the projection of $\begin{pmatrix} 4 \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}$ onto $\mathbf{w}.$

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: The projection of $\begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ 3 \end{pmatrix}$ onto a certain vector $\mathbf{w}$ is $\begin{pmatrix} -9/10 \\ 3/10 \end{pmatrix}.$  Find the projection of $\begin{pmatrix} 4 \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}$ onto $\mathbf{w}.$
